channel.title: The ScaseCast
channel.description:
Each episode of the ScaseCast features Professor Richard Scase discussing a business topic, providing the kind of insight and ideas he is renowned for. The programmes also feature excerpts from Professor Scase's energetic, fact-filled live speeches.
The Scasecast is a free podcast, published monthly.
For more information about Professor Scase and booking him as a speaker, please visit www.richardscase.com.
This podcast series is produced by Red Studios, www.redstudios.co.uk.
The ScaseCast is supported by the RSA Technical Academy - creating competitive advantage by building Technical Mastery.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Europe's leading business strategist discusses key issues

channel.itunes:keywords: business, entrepreneur, entrepreneurs, leader, leadership, management, podexec

item.title: Setting up business during a recession
item.description: In Scasecast seventeen Professor Richard Scase discusses setting up a business during the current recession.
item.itunes:author: Professor Richard Scase
item.itunes:summary:
The seventeenth in a series of podcasts from Professor Richard Scase. In this episode Professor Scase talks about how to set up a business in the current recession.
For more information about Professor Richard Scase visit www.richardscase.com
The ScaseCast is supported by the RSA Technical Academy - creating competitive advantage by building Technical Mastery.

item.title: Leadership Lessons
item.description: The third in a series of podcasts from Professor Richard Scase. In this episode Professor Scase talks to Steve Parks about how we can take lessons in effective leadership from smaller firms.

item.title: International Business
item.description: The first in a new series of podcasts from Professor Richard Scase, he talks to Steve Parks about International issues for managers including language barriers and business etiquette.
